did.head: DESCRIPTIVE SUMMARY
did.unittitle: London Trades Council Official Programme of the Great Demonstrations, 1891
did.repository: Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library
did.abstract: Official program for a demonstration under the auspices of the London Trades Council in Hyde Park on May 3, 1891.

scopecontent.head: COLLECTION DESCRIPTION
scopecontent.p: This collection consists of the official program for a demonstration under the auspices of the London Trades Council in Hyde Park on May 3, 1891.

accessrestrict.head: Access Restrictions:
accessrestrict.p: Access to the collections in the Kheel Center is restricted. Please contact a reference archivist for access to these materials.

userestrict.head: Restrictions on Use:
userestrict.p: This collection must be used in keeping with the Kheel Center Information Sheet and Procedures for Document Use.

prefercite.head: Cite As:
prefercite.p: London Trades Council Official Programme of the Great Demonstrations #5144m. Kheel Center for Labor-Management Documentation and Archives, Cornell University Library.

relatedmaterial.head: RELATED MATERIALS
relatedmaterial.p:

5582: Archives Foreign File (AFF)

did.unittitle: Official Programme of the Great Demonstration of Organized Labour Trades Under the Auspices of the London Trades Council in Hyde Park, on Sunday, May 3, 1891

scopecontent.p: To Celebrate the First Anniversary of the Legal Eight Hours' Movement. Chief Marshall Mr. G. Shipton, Secretary of London Trades Council; May 3, 1891.
